title: How to safely switch your production apps to DeepSeek with Helicone
title1: How to safely switch your production apps to DeepSeek with Helicone
title2: How to safely switch your production apps to DeepSeek with Helicone
description: Learn how to use Helicone's experiments feature to safely switch to DeepSeek. This guide covers regression testing, model comparison, and seamless transition using production data without impacting users.
author: Scott Nguyen
